title:
Practically universal representation of the Helfand-Werthamer upper
  critical field for any transport scattering rate
authors: Ruslan Prozorov and Vladimir G. Kogan
abstract:
The simplified scaling of the orbital upper critical field, $H_{c2}(T)$, for
the isotropic case is discussed. To facilitate the analysis of the experimental
data, we suggest a simple but accurate approximation in the entire temperature
range of the scaled upper critical field valid for any transport scattering
rate $H_{c2}/H_{c2}(0) \approx (1-t^2)/(1+0.42 \,t^{1.47})$.
